title: Fundamentals of Construction Management
description: Production of drawings and specifications for residential and light commercial construction. Integration of scheduling, estimating, codes, and contracts with a project based approach. Manual drawing techniques and computer aided drafting with building information modeling develop visualization skills for architectural systems. 4 laboratories, 2 activities.
prerequisites: ARCE 106 or CM 113 and CM 114; MATH 141, and PHYS 141
